short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Narrows down the possible words for skribble.io.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension intelligently filters out words using the game's default word bank. Now includes the latest words from the November 2022 update!

Pin this extension to your toolbar for easy access!
